name: Block Slender-Man 2: The Forest of Soul Harvest Hunter Pocket Edition
name_original: Block Slender-Man 2: The Forest of Soul Harvest Hunter Pocket Edition
description:
*** 50% price cut for very limited time ***
CHOP woods! BUILD your SHELTER! CRAFT your WEAPONS! SURVIVE with YOUR FRIENDS! HIDE n SEEK with SLENDER MAN! FIND THE LUCKY BLOCKS

Be the first who survives! and collect all the achievements!

> Worldwide Multiplayer
> Drivable Cars
> Large maps with gorgeous atmosphere
> Scary Military Base scene
> Craft unique tools from materials
> TRUE FEAR!

and of course SLENDER-MAN!

Check out the game and whether you liked or not, *****rate***** us!
